channel.title: Tutorial on ET et Sidus
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on ET et Sidus

item.title: How to install m10c theme.
item.description: Your m10c theme from ZERO to one This is a short tutorial to help us building a Hugo blog with m10c theme. This memo has four parts as following:Part 1 - Pre tools setting Part 2 - Build a Hugo framework Part 3 - Host on GitHub Part 4 - Final Step Part 5 - Real Final Step Reference

item.title: How to post Hugo content
item.description: How to post a Hugo markdown AND Chinese Testing 中文測試 How to post a Hugo content Step 1: To enter into your blog root folder, ie, ‘blog’ in my case: $ cd hugo Therefore entered into $ hugo Step 2: create a new post(markdown format title.md) by $ hugo new post/title.md And then please your familiar text editor to complete your content writing and save. My favourite editor for GitHub writing is Atom IDE and Vim command line.
